dmca.title: Spanish Company complains of defamation in Google search (13)
dmca.body:
Subject: To remove the infringing pages from Google [redacted]


We request the suppression as soon as possible of the specified URL because we have found some offending pages with our Google search results about our company. We are suffering from some defamatory attacks caused by some people who use their anonymity in some forums, and we will be pleased if you can help us.
We would be grateful if you will this matter one of your serious attention.


We have found it on Google's search "revelance":
1.	The Google website where the information above appears: Google.es,
2.	Identify our country of residence and citizenship: Espana
3.	Identify precisely the information that you claim violates your rights under applicable law (the "Unlawful Material"). Some information contained in the forums:

[redacted]

4.	The reason that we believe the information indicated above violates our rights or is illegal under applicable law. "The search result URL identified above contains defamatory information about my company that is not permitted under the laws of the country in which I reside or I am a citizen".

5.	Information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact us Name: 
[private]
Director


6.	Information sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the webpage that allegedly contains the Unlawful Material (webmaster or domain registrant name and email address).
